title: What are your best US rap songs ever? - Quora

response.answer_text: Comming up with a list of say,ten of my favourite ever US rap songs is easy enough,the hard part would be deciding which song goes in first place,which in 2nd and so on, so i’m gonna list 10 of my favouritees,but in no particular order: 1.Shook 1’s part2(Mobb Deep) 2.Suicidal Thoughts(Notorious BIG) 3.So much pain(izzamusic rmx/2pac) 4.Dead Wrong(izzamusic rmx/Notorious BIG) 5.Last Kings(2pac feat. Eminem) 6.The Uppercut(izzamusic rmx/2pac) 7.Gin&Juice(Snoop Dogg) 8.Homicide(logic feat.Eminem) 9.Cause of Death(immortal Technique) 10.One more Chance(Notorious BIG)

its might be “Hall of Fame by The Script” and “In The End by Linkin Park” That's not actually rap song. But those have strong lyrics with best motivation. Thats ya from my sights those has best US rap list.
